name: Galactic Travel Agency
description:
Welcome to Galactic Travel Agency, an entity fully devoted on delivering the best traveling experience in any galaxy. As a driver, it's your responsibility to uphold the Company's immaculate reputation by providing safe, speedy and memorable travels to every passenger aboard. As it is your first day on the job, we are certain you will keep the Company's best interest in mind with every decision. Failure to do so will result in immediate termination.

Thank you for choosing Galactic Travel Agency as your employer, we are honored to have you. Safe travels!
